text: another one of them huge long bus stops to cater to the to and fro passengers from the train station and across. will always be crowded at most times, but it is amazingly always kept pretty clean. has pretty decent amount of seating too should you need to sit while waiting for your bus,
Take bus 240 or 246 to go to Boon Lay Shopping centre

They always have offers,friendly staff and over variety of cakes and pastries.....however,lately I can see them selling food which is cold and tastes stale..perhaps it could be due to less sales but selling old food is also not good for customers health.. business ethics are important too
Old MRT Station needs to refurbish and expand the capacity yo house more passengers during peak hours.
Typical MRT station in the West
